DefaultEvent.Description: $Khan -> カーン, Khan's Heart -> カーンの心臓$The Travel-Writer snaps shut his journal. "I've only one last place I wish to visit: Khan's Heart. Take me there whenever is most convenient."
DefaultEvent.Name: A final chapter

ChildBranches.Name: Give the Travel-Writer passage
ChildBranches.Description: Two hundred echoes for a last voyage? He can consider it done.

DefaultEvent.Description: The August Travel-Writer frowns sharply at you. "What a pity," he says. "I shan't hold a grudge, captain. My work will do you justice." He gathers his trunk from below deck and departs.
DefaultEvent.Name: Taken in good grace

ChildBranches.Name: Refuse to aid the Travel-Writer
ChildBranches.Description: You want no part of it.

Description: The August Travel-Writer makes a few notes in his journal as you walk back to your ship. His suit is immaculate, though his hands are ink-stained. "I've one last port to visit," he says quietly. "There's two hundred echoes in it for you this time."
Name: The August Travel-Writer's Request
